metadata.title: CVE-2024-31081 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The ProcXIPassiveGrabDevice() function uses the byte-swapped length ofthe return data for the amount of data to return to the client, if theclient has a different endianness than the X server.

criterions.comment: xorg-server package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
